ns:common.document.text:
FourGen Software Technologies was established in Seattle as an accounting software provider in 1983 by Gary Gagliardi, Rebecca Gagliardi, Loren West and later joined by Gordon Schaeffer. The company quickly grew internationally with global customers across all continents. In 1998, FourGen was sold by the starters and later acquired by www.gillani.com in 2002.
The FourGen CASE Tools, originally developed in 1983 and bundled with Informix-4GL as I-4GL Forms, I-4GL Menu's until 1996, are the cornerstone of MBD (Modifiability by Design) concept, and provide a Rapid Application Development environment for industrial strength applications on Informix-4GL technology that will run against either Informix, DB2, or Oracle databases.
Gillani Financialsâ„¢
Whether it is the management of receivables and payables or accounts and budget, Gillani Financials provides the tools to make your accounting personnel productive and effective in the execution of their job functions. Automated functions allows your personnel to concentrate on problem areas and not spend time processing payments that are clearly earmarked to specific cash applications.
Easy to learn and understand graphic user interfaces
